subsection_analysis.refined_text: The timestamp capability and native support for long-term validation of signatures (introduced in Acrobat 9.1) is in compliance with Part 4 of the PAdES standard.

The text box moves around a stationary anchor point—the arrow on the end-point line—created when you first click in the PDF. You can modify the color and appearance of the text box and add arrows or leaders to the end-point line.

Create the appearance of a certificate-based signature You determine the look of your certificate-based signature by selecting options in the Signatures panel of the Preferences dialog box. For example, you can include an image of your handwritten signature, a company logo, or a photograph.

XML data signatures Acrobat and Acrobat Reader support XML data signatures that are used to sign data in XML Forms Architectures (XFA) forms. The form author provides XML signing, validating, or clearing instructions for form events, such as button click, file save, or submit.
millions of users worldwide to create digital signatures that are trusted whenever the signed document is opened in Acrobat or Reader software.

You can also create different signatures for different purposes. A signature can also include information that helps others verify your signature , such as the reason for signing, contact information, and more.

Note: You can add comments to Japanese, Chinese, and Korean text with the Text Box tool, but you must have the Asian-language resource files installed. You can use the Text callout tool to create a callout text box.
Managing Digital IDs: Help pages for digital ID management.

What steps do we take to protect your content when you share it with us as part of providing feedback? • When you share your documents, textual prompts, and the generated responses with us when providing feedback, we take steps to filter out personal information by applying data masking procedures to this content (i.e., replacing personal information with predefined categories using Named Entity Recognition, e.g., replacing “John Smith” with “PERSON”) prior to using the content for product improvement.
Acrobat lets you create your certificate ID. However, the common approach is to work with a certificate ID from a trusted third-party certificate authority.
Type your user name and password, or follow the directions to create an account.

If I’m signed into my adobe account, does acrobat’s generative ai features automatically start processing my documents when I launch the application, or open a file in the application? Acrobat’s generative AI features, like AI Assistant, do not start automatically processing any of your documents upon application launch or upon opening a file into the application.
Adobe LiveCycle Rights Management (ALCRM) servers Adobe LiveCycleRights Management (ALCRM) servers let you define centralized policies to control access to documents.

• Waiting for You - Indicates that the agreement is waiting for the sender to countersign the agreement. • Activity for the Bulk Send parent template (orange square) - The Activity > link at the bottom of the context panel opens a chronological list of the enablement actions taken against the (parent) Bulk Send template (eg: Creation, Completed events).

• Content is stored for 30 days in an encrypted, siloed, Adobe-controlled environment with strict access controls. You can always contact us via the form in our Privacy Policy if you want us to delete this data sooner, or if you want to opt out of the use of your content to improve generative AI capabilities in Acrobat and Acrobat Reader.
